title: Oatmeal cookie apple crumble
ingredients: ['For the filling', '750g peeled and sliced apples', '100g caster sugar', '1 tablespoon plain flour', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1/4 teaspoon salt', 'For the topping', '60g rolled oats', '100g plain flour', '110g soft brown sugar', '1/2 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1/4 teaspoon baking powder', '110g butter, melted']
